amendment.description: To provide under section 223 for oversight of procurement, performance criteria, and operational test plans for ballistic missile defense programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 711 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 711 proposed by Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S6651-6657, S6696-6697; text: CR S6651-6652; text as modified: CR S6697) To provide under section 223 for oversight of procurement, performance criteria, and operational test plans for ballistic missile defense programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 711 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 711 proposed by Senator Reed.
